```{r context="setup", include=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
vaccine_df <- read.csv(file="StudentData_clean.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")
```


Inputs {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r context="render"}
numericInput(inputId = "n_samp", 
             label = "Sample size:", 
             min = 1, max = nrow(vaccine_df),
             value = 50)


```


```{r context="render"}
vaccine_sample <- reactive({
  req(input$n_samp)
  sample_n(vaccine_df, input$n_samp)
})

```

Outputs
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Data Table

```{r context="server"}
output$grantstable <- DT::renderDataTable({
  DT::datatable(vaccine_sample(), 
              options = list(pageLength = 10), 
              rownames = FALSE)})
```

```{r context="render"}
DT::dataTableOutput(outputId = "grantstable")
```

```{r context="server"}
ggplot(data, aes(x=Polio, fill=schoolType)) + geom_density(alpha=.15)
```
